name: Land Of Nod - Annihilation
description:
Enter the dreams of millions of children fighting everynight against that fluffy threst in the toybox.

Play as those evil toys come to life in a plot for complete domination.

Simple Controls W,S.A,D movement mouse to rotate and Left click to Shoot (Pew Pew)

Just Because We Had So Much Fun Making & Playing With This Project We Will Be Building This Game Further & Will Never Charge For Updates, These Will Include Further Weapons If You Have Anything you Would LIke To See In Land Of Nod - Annihilation Please Let Us Kow Via Out Facebook Page https://www.facebook.com/DuelGaugeEntertainment
